definitions: Reduces (something) to small particles or powder by crushing it.
Sharpens or smooths (something) by rubbing it against a rough surface.
Operates (a mill or other machine) to crush or pulverize something.
Works or studies hard, especially for a long period.
Rotates or moves with a harsh, grating sound.
examples: He grinds his teeth when he's angry.
The student grinds away at his books.
The old mill grinds grain into flour.
The gears make a terrible noise as they grinds.
